other_tests.findings: No lipid-laden macrophages noted in the lavage fluid.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressive hypoxia and interstitial infiltrates over the next 3 months, leading to lung biopsy diagnosis.

other_tests.findings: Pathologic diagnosis of exogenous lipoid pneumonia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No pathologic features of hypersensitivity pneumonitis evident.

other_tests.findings: Global left ventricular ejection fraction less than 0.20.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased to 0.40 on day 2; increased to 0.50 on day 3 after levosimendan therapy.
